comments.author: makitso@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

On WIN7 using FF 7 or 8, the password manager will not run nor can you save bookmarks.  The system in question is a Dell XPS 15z using a NVIDIA 525M video card.


Actual results:

Using the NVIDIA Control Panel, and turning off Vertical Sync fixed the problem.
Running FF in safe mode resolves the problem.
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

On WIN7 using FF 7 or 8, the password manager will not run nor can you save bookmarks.  The system in question is a Dell XPS 15z using a NVIDIA 525M video card.


Actual results:

Using the NVIDIA Control Panel, and turning off Vertical Sync fixed the problem.
Running FF in safe mode resolves the problem.

Please post the graphic section from about:support
This looks like a driver bug.
